about_the_game:
A sandbox for those who could loose track of time making their own vehicles for hours.




  • Sandbox: Build your own unique spaceplane to explore procedurally generated islands or space, finding and collecting scrap, discovering new parts and upgrading your ship to larger sizes as you progress.
  • Unique parts: Discover and experiment with countless unique parts such as; engine types like electric, hydrogen, VTOL and more to alter the way the plane flies and lands. Unique wings, landing gear, air brakes, power generation tech, weapons to mine scrap, automation tech and more.




  • Flight: Experience relaxing but unique 2D flight physics designed to not punish asymmetric building, but still provide a thoroughly modifiable flight model depending on your choices as you build your spaceplane.

short_description: You are a Scraponaut, create your own spaceplane with unique parts each affecting the way your plane behaves. Collect scrap while exploring procedurally generated islands, unlock and discover unique new parts to upgrade your spaceplane.
